description:
11.147 limitdiff
Apply limited difference filter using second and optionally third video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

elasticity.description: Set the elasticity of soft thresholding when processing video streams. This value multiplied with the first one sets the second threshold. Any absolute difference value greater or exact than the second threshold will pick pixel components from the second video stream. For values between those two thresholds, linear interpolation between the first and second video stream will be used.

planes.description: Specify which planes will be processed. Defaults to all available.

reference.description: Enable the reference (third) video stream processing. By default, it is disabled. If set, this video stream will be used for calculating the absolute difference with the first video stream.

threshold.description: Set the threshold to use when allowing certain differences between video streams. Any absolute difference value lower or exact than this threshold will pick pixel components from the first video stream.
